General.Name: Pharmsville Co. Ltd
General.Description: Pharmsville Co., Ltd. produces and sells functional health foods in South Korea. The company primarily exports its products to the United States, China, Malaysia, Indonesia, Vietnam, Hong Kong, etc. It offers its products under the Apple Tree Dr. Kim, Devil Diet, Vitamin Story, Apple Tree, Golden Garden, Daily Green, Doctor Solution, and Doctor's Answer brand names. Pharmsville Co., Ltd. was founded in 2000 and headquartered in Seoul. South Korea.
